pages.title: 關於我
pages.text: 雜食性的貓Software Developer / Support Engineer / Tech Consultant。文章以技術 / 桌遊 / 遊戲心得 / 雜談為主。本來主要在 Medium 寫，那邊之後可能會以放桌遊文章為主。其他雜談 / 技術文章會都轉移到這邊來寫，那邊的客群應該本來也就都是去看桌遊規則的。桌遊的速記類型也會寫在這邊。突然有天覺得想弄個無拘無束的 blog，所以稍微翻了下合適的資源 ─最後選定了 hexo，看起來有一定使用者，使用輕量。至於主題挑了 minos，主要就是支援多語言。於是有了這個 blog。

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: Hexo 快速指令
posts.text: Generate the static pages 12$hexo generate$hexo g Run static page by hexo host 12$hexo server$hexo s New an article in hexo 12$hexo new "ArticleName"$hexo n "ArticleName" Clean cache 1$hexo clean Deploy 1$hexo deploy Deployment template can be found under _config.yml. Find the paragraph or add it into the config. 12345deploy: type: git repo: <repository url> #https://bitbucket.org/JohnSmith/johnsmith.bitbucket.io branch: [branch] message: [message]
